00006 void CellMappingHcal::print(  std::ostream& os ){

00009      << ", cellID: " <<  getCellID()

00012     os << " slotID: "  << getSlotID() <<  std::endl;
00013   os << " FE: "  << getFeID() <<  std::endl;
00014   os << " Position in Multiplexing series: "  << getMulID() <<  std::endl;

00016   os << " CellIndex i: " << getCellIndex("i") << " CellIndex j: "

00025 short CellMappingHcal::getCellIndex(std::string indexStr)
00026 {
00027 
00028   _index = -1;  
00029 
00030   if (indexStr != "i" && indexStr != "j" && indexStr != "k") {
00031     std::cout << "Please use characters i,j or k !!!" << std::endl;
00032     std::cout << "Will return -1" << std::endl;
00033     return _index;
00034   } 
00035 
00036    
00037   if (indexStr == "i" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(1) >> ICOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00038   if (indexStr == "j" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(1) >> JCOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00039   if (indexStr == "k" ) _index = ( (obj()->getIntVal(1) >> KCOORDSHIFT) & 0xff ); 
00040   
00041   return _index;
00042 }
00043 
00044 }
